issue.title: Use configured default type mappings in ExecuteSql

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

body:
@AndriySvyryd I am getting this same error with current release of EF, but using the `FromSqlInterpolated` method. Using accountId in linq to sql works fine. Is this supposed to be fixed for FromSql... methods as well?

Calling `Accounts.FromSqlInterpolated($"EXEC [user].pGetAccounts {accountId}")`
